title: Mailvox: slutwalking
author: VD
content_html: A number of people have emailed me about the Great Canadian Slut Walk – slogan: she’s not slutty, she’s Canadian – and wondered about my response to it. I have accordingly posted my thoughts on the subject at Alpha Game.
content_text:
A number of people have emailed me about
the Great Canadian Slut Walk
– slogan: she’s not slutty, she’s Canadian – and wondered about my response to it.  I have accordingly posted my thoughts on the subject
at Alpha Game
.
